channel.title: Making varrock a safe place?
channel.description: i have a czar based server and i've tried to make varrock a safe place, but still as usual, i fail. Anyone have an idea on how to do it? Or gimme a cp XD

item.title: Making varrock a safe place?
item.dc:creator: @Xx_R_A_G_3_R Xx R A G 3 R
item.description:
@Xx_R_A_G_3_R wrote:

Search for something name nonWild in client.java you will find a list of coordinates

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 )

The first absX would be your northwest corner’s X coord, second absX is your northeast X coord, first absY is your southwest Y coord, second is southeast Y coord

Hope i helped

Read full topic
